If I'm not mistaken, it says here that permission is granted without limitation to modify Pterodactyl Panel.

Also, about the second bit, you should never have brought your ass in there!

Kind Regards,
Cian,
Assistant of Joseph @ Hye Hosting

attributes.bio: Head of Customer Service at Hye Hosting LLC

attributes.contentHtml: Cian yes modify however if you read the second line after that it states that the copyright must be present on all significant pages you nitwit
